channel.title: Realting Project Skill-To-PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/realtinglogoownage.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]well this project is going to be based about pking but to pk at hight standards you will need to skill.[/SIZE]
Bored of pking "ONLY" servers? well this is not "ONLY" pking server but its a skiller server like for example in shops theres is no sharks super pots nothing...theres only basics like normal pots lobsters big bones. BUT however there are shops that sell good items but to buy the good items you will need money and to get money you either pk or skill and sell your resources.
So In REALTING we offer you either spending your money in stores provided or doing minigames and skilling to get what you need.
[SIZE="4"][url=http://www.realting.co.tv] -----FORUM-----[/url][/SIZE]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_profilepage&v=caXbgmMXYnA][SIZE="5"]9 SWitches in 3 seconds + A SPEC![/SIZE][/url]
[SIZE="6"]Pking videos!![/SIZE] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y8lgrkzaoRo][SIZE="4"]YouTube - Realting--Epic d claw rushing+dhoraking![/SIZE].......[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVC2WAeb1wI][SIZE="4"]YouTube - Realting--Pure pking--risking--clawing-miasmic barraging--more[/SIZE].......[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KKNdZ2q0uq0]YouTube - Realting--dmace--dharoking--more....[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d9uErLzoiXg]YouTube - Realting--sol--dmace--divine-alot more....[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4eyaWsLtmc]YouTube - Realting--sol--stat ham-vls-steam[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oxWCi7IHYs4]YouTube - Realting pkin video BETA!![/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GatEnAIeKAc]YouTube - realting pk vid Whip vs tank[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Je2n11W5ps]YouTube - Realting pk Bridding EPIC![/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6uljBaIDKM]YouTube - Realting pk tanking mage bank!![/url]
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/combat-1.png[/img]
Perfect combat but still needs to be coded to make it even better!
---Melee---
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/overloads.gif[/img] ALL godsword spec 100% Dragon claws spec 70% (needs the right damage formula) Dragon Dagger 100% it dsnt do 40-0 it does 25-15 :P Granite maul coded 100% for switches and comboes.
---Range--- Magic shortbow 100% real rs hits +spec :) Range and 2h nearly perfect!
---Magic--- Multy ancient spells on players only at the moment Multy miasmic barrage that requires Real rs runes + real rs damage :) Steam necklace adds more magic damage Staff of light adds more damage to your magic spell [IMG]http://i1000.photobucket.com/albums/af125/callumh_2009/multybarrage.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/curses.png[/img] Turmoil 100% -Got effect on max hit bonus -Increase bonuses
Soulsplit 98% - Drains away prayer from the oponent - Heals you after each hit
leeches 87% - Drains oponents bonuses - Adds extra bonuses to you
saps 0%
protect item 100% - Protects extra item after death
deflects 70% - Does some damage back when its activated and the opponent is hitting you
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/Untitled-1-1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/skills-1.png[/img]
Fishing 97% -Catching fish -Time of catching fish varies on the fishing level -Right equipment & level needed to catch specific fish -Right emotion for all of the fishing equipment when fishing [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/fishing-1.png[/img]
Cooking 97% -Cooks fish -Stops burning fish at specific level -Need specific level to cook specific fish -Emotion + timing of cooking the fish [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/cooking1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/cooking.png[/img]
Fishing store located where the fishing is :) [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/fishing.png[/img]
Herblore 97% -Makes potions -Requires ingredients & level to make Potion
Herblore store is located in cathebery near the bank :) [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/herblore.png[/img]
Thieving 97% -Steal from the stall to gain cash -Steal npc to gain cash or a random item -Has anti auto clicker it teles away if you auto click more then 10 click in 1 second
Woodcutting 90%% & fletching 90% [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/fishingandcooking.png[/img] Firemaking 0% Mining 90% & Smithing 90% [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/miningandsmith.png[/img] Farming 90% [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/farming.png[/img] Agility 90% -Timing on the logs/ropes -Get 10 tickets if you ONLY finish the course -Switches from run to walk on the logs/ropes [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/agility.png[/img] Runecrafting 0%
Crafting 90% [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/crafting.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/npc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/damn.gif[/img] There will be minigames and monsters that will drop equipment like claws gs and ect.. but the monster im going to have are.. [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/worms.gif[/img] Tormented demons-nothing special.. Corp beast-nothing special.. The Gluttonous behemoth some dungeoneering monster. [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/dungeoneering-sht.gif[/img] Runebound behemoth some dungeoneering monster. Bulwark Beast some dungeoneering monster. Spirit terrorbird for training :) Mandrith The bounty hunter NPC that was in rs when bounty hunter was released. Strykewyrm all kind from ice to jungle. ALL of the new dragon models.
SERVER WILL BE UPDATED ALOT AS IT STILL NEEDS ALOT ADDED :P
[/CENTER]

item.title: Realting Project Skill-To-PK
item.dc:creator: @titas_aka_b00m titas aka b00m
item.description:
@titas_aka_b00m wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=“5”]well this project is going to be based about pking but to pk at hight standards you will need to skill.[/SIZE]

Bored of pking “ONLY” servers? well this is not “ONLY” pking server but its a skiller server like for example in shops theres is no sharks super pots nothing…theres only basics like normal pots lobsters big bones. BUT however there are shops that sell good items but to buy the good items you will need money and to get money you either pk or skill and sell your resources.

So In REALTING we offer you either spending your money in stores provided or doing minigames and skilling to get what you need.

[SIZE=“4”] -----FORUM-----[/SIZE]

[SIZE=“5”]9 SWitches in 3 seconds + A SPEC![/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”]Pking videos!![/SIZE]
[SIZE=“4”]YouTube - Realting–Epic d claw rushing+dhoraking![/SIZE]…
[SIZE=“4”]YouTube - Realting–Pure pking–risking–clawing-miasmic barraging–more[/SIZE]…
YouTube - Realting–dmace–dharoking–more…
YouTube - Realting–sol–dmace–divine-alot more…
YouTube - Realting–sol–stat ham-vls-steam
YouTube - Realting pkin video BETA!!
YouTube - realting pk vid Whip vs tank
YouTube - Realting pk Bridding EPIC!
YouTube - Realting pk tanking mage bank!!

Perfect combat but still needs to be coded to make it even better!

—Melee—


ALL godsword spec 100%
Dragon claws spec 70% (needs the right damage formula)
Dragon Dagger 100% it dsnt do 40-0 it does 25-15
Granite maul coded 100% for switches and comboes.

—Range—
Magic shortbow 100% real rs hits +spec
Range and 2h nearly perfect!

—Magic—
Multy ancient spells on players only at the moment
Multy miasmic barrage that requires Real rs runes + real rs damage
Steam necklace adds more magic damage
Staff of light adds more damage to your magic spell


Turmoil 100%
-Got effect on max hit bonus
-Increase bonuses

Soulsplit 98%

  • Drains away prayer from the oponent
  • Heals you after each hit

leeches 87%

  • Drains oponents bonuses
  • Adds extra bonuses to you

saps 0%

protect item 100%

  • Protects extra item after death

deflects 70%

  • Does some damage back when its activated and the opponent is hitting you

Fishing 97%
-Catching fish
-Time of catching fish varies on the fishing level
-Right equipment & level needed to catch specific fish
-Right emotion for all of the fishing equipment when fishing

fishing-1.png770×500

Cooking 97%
-Cooks fish
-Stops burning fish at specific level
-Need specific level to cook specific fish
-Emotion + timing of cooking the fish

cooking1.png761×498

cooking.png759×499

Fishing store located where the fishing is

Herblore 97%
-Makes potions
-Requires ingredients & level to make Potion

Herblore store is located in cathebery near the bank

Thieving 97%
-Steal from the stall to gain cash
-Steal npc to gain cash or a random item
-Has anti auto clicker it teles away if you auto click more then 10 click in 1 second

Woodcutting 90%% & fletching 90%

Firemaking 0%
Mining 90% & Smithing 90%

Farming 90%

Agility 90%
-Timing on the logs/ropes
-Get 10 tickets if you ONLY finish the course
-Switches from run to walk on the logs/ropes

Runecrafting 0%

Crafting 90%



There will be minigames and monsters that will drop equipment like claws gs and ect…
but the monster im going to have are…

Tormented demons-nothing special…
Corp beast-nothing special…
The Gluttonous behemoth some dungeoneering monster.

Runebound behemoth some dungeoneering monster.
Bulwark Beast some dungeoneering monster.
Spirit terrorbird for training
Mandrith The bounty hunter NPC that was in rs when bounty hunter was released.
Strykewyrm all kind from ice to jungle.
ALL of the new dragon models.

SERVER WILL BE UPDATED ALOT AS IT STILL NEEDS ALOT ADDED

[/CENTER]
